		<style>
			/* If there is a fixed header */
			.header {
				position: relative;
				top: auto;
			}
			.main {
				padding: 0;
			}

			/* Alert banner styling */
			.alert-banner {
				display: none;
				background-color: #003F72;
				color: #FFFFFF;
				left: 0;
				margin-top: 0;
				padding: 2rem 1rem 0.8rem;
				position: relative;
				text-align: center;
				top: 0;
				width: 100%;
			}
			.alert-banner * {
				margin-top: 0;
			}
			.alert-banner.lightblue {
